API for user code, for example scripts that interact with the display builder. Fundamental display model API:
  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.model.Widget}
  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.model.DisplayModel}
Helpers for scripts:
  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.runtime.script.PVUtil}
  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.runtime.script.ScriptUtil}
